item.title: La Cassa De Papel's Soundtrack-Bella Ciao in Chinese
item.description: 啊!朋友再见 (中文版) Bella ciao - Chinese version. A movie of how eight thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the Royal Mint of Spain as a criminal mastermind manipulates the police to carry out his plan.
